sentences.en: A cheerful and supportive disposition is what you are being assessed for.
sentences.cn: 别人经常评价你有令人愉快和乐于助人的性格.

sentences.en: A supportive house for eight to ten older people, each with his or her own room, provides privacy and a sense of community.
sentences.cn: 一幢扶助性住宅可供8至10位老人居住，每个人都有自己单独的房间，在这里，他们既能独处，又有社区归属感。

sentences.en: Good knowledge of adhesive and supportive material of ground.
sentences.cn: 熟练掌握粘合剂和地面基体材料的知识.

sentences.en: Her boss was very supportive and gave her time off work to see her mum.
sentences.cn: 她的老板非常热心地帮助她，并准许她请假去看望母亲。

sentences.en: I am flattered that they should be so supportive.
sentences.cn: 他们这么帮忙，我深感荣幸。

sentences.en: Increased freshwater aquaculture, poultry and grass - based animal husbandry and other supportive efforts.
sentences.cn: 加大淡水养殖 、 家禽和食草型动物等多种饲养业的扶持力度.

sentences.en: My family were very supportive throughout the divorce.
sentences.cn: 离婚过程中我的家人自始至终都很支持我。

sentences.en: No treatment other than supportive care exists for canine distemper.
sentences.cn: 不接受任何治疗的辅助治疗以外存在犬瘟热.

sentences.en: The crowd he hangs out with is very mature and supportive.
sentences.cn: 他的朋友圈都非常成熟,能给予不少帮助.

sentences.en: The rising costs of steel prices will also play a supportive role.
sentences.cn: 成本的上升也将对钢材价格产生支撑作用.

sentences.en: They were always supportive of each other.
They're both tough taskmasters, but Stephen is much more supportive.
sentences.cn: 他们俩都是严厉的工头，不过斯蒂芬更喜欢帮助他人。

sentences.en: They're very loyal and supportive with a deep capacity for love.
sentences.cn: 他们极为忠诚,富有爱的能力.

sentences.en: This rare ocular angiostrongyliasis was received supportive treatment and close observation only.
sentences.cn: 经过三个月的观察及治疗,症状改善,左眼虫体融解后吸收.

sentences.en: To let go is not to fix, but to be supportive.
sentences.cn: 放手,就不要事事躬亲, 包办善后;而是在需要是伸出援助之手.

sentences.en: Women are often forced into a supportive role in the family.
sentences.cn: 妇女往往被迫在家庭中成为辅助角色.

words.tran_cn: 可支持的；可援助的；可忍耐的
支持的；辅助性的；次要的
支持，维持；支援，供养；支持者，支撑物
支持，支撑，支援；扶持，帮助；赡养，供养

trans.tran_en: giving help or encouragement, especially to someone who is in a difficult situation – used to show approval
